subject: Hello
body:
Hello
I am contacting you in regard to the handling of an investment
project. I represent a client who wants to invest in your country.
I will give you more information upon your response.
Sincerely yours
Frank West

subject: Re:    Hello
body:
Hello Frank West,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by your proposal and would love to hear more about this investment project. Could you please provide some more details? What kind of investment are we talking about here? And what role would I be expected to play in it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Edith
